articles.title: "Terror Proxies In South Asia": Quad Leaders' Statement A Message For Pakistan - NDTV
articles.description: Quad leaders denounced the use of "terrorist proxies" in South Asia, in a veiled reference to Pakistan, as they emphasised the importance of denying any support to terror groups which could plan terror attacks, including cross-border attacks.
articles.content:
Quad leaders have, in a joint statement, denounced the use of "terrorist proxies" in South Asia

articles.title: India tells Quad will allow export of 8 million Indo-Pacific vaccine doses - CNBCTV18
articles.description: A plan reached by the Quad earlier this year to supply a billion COVID-19 shots across Asia by the end of 2022 stalled after India, the world’s largest vaccine producer, banned exports in April amid a massive COVID outbreak at home.
articles.content: MiniA plan reached by the Quad earlier this year to supply a billion COVID-19 shots across Asia by the end of 2022 stalled after India, the worlds largest vaccine producer, banned exports in April am… [+35 chars]
